title: Relates to establishing the children's ounce of prevention fund from revenues received through the stock transfer tax
summary: Establishes the children's ounce of prevention fund from revenues received through the stock transfer tax; decreases percentage of tax rebate currently allowed in order to fund programs relating to achievement of new high learning standards.
